title: How do I get my Isa score re-evaluated ??
content: I hadn't bubbled my 4 marker q number they considered in sm subjects but not in other subjects wt do I do ??

comments.body: There will be a free reval conducted next week. Attend that

Yes you will be allowed to see all the papers with what answers you have written and what marks the teacher has alloted you if not satisfied u have an option to submit a request for them to reevaluate that particular answer you can give your reasons in the prompt provided there
we dont have to pay for isa re-eval?
